info.title: Shipping Admin
info.description: OpenAPI Spec for Kibo Shipping Admin Service

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Used to page results from a query. Indicates the zero-based offset in the complete result set where the returned entities begin. For example, with a PageSize of 25, to get the 51st through the 75th items, startIndex=3. The default value is 0. Optional.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Used to page results from a query. Indicates the maximum number of entities to return from a query. The default value is 20 and the maximum value is 200. Optional.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The element to sort the results by and the order in which the results appear. Either ascending (a-z) or descending (z-a) order. Optional.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: A set of filter expressions representing the search parameters for a query: eq=equals, ne=not equals, gt=greater than, lt = less than or equals, gt = greater than or equals, lt = less than or equals, sw = starts with, or cont = contains. Optional.

value.description: The value of this custom table rate

deliveryDuration.description:
The number of days it takes to ship the item on custom carrier types. 
Allowed values : EXPRESS, 1_DAY, 2_DAY, 3_DAY

id.description: Carrier Id (usually a shortname of a carrier, e.g. FedEx)

enabled.description: Indicates that this CarrierConfiguration should be used at runtime

enabledForReturns.description: Indicates that this CarrierConfiguration should be the default for returns shipping

customTableRates.description:
A list of custom table rates for the 'Custom' carrier
<remarks>only use this if Id == 'Custom'</remarks>

areCredentialsSet.description:
Indicates whether the credentials/passwords are set.
<remarks>Credetials are updated only if this flag is set to true</remarks>

code.description: Unique Service Type Code for a particular Carrier

carrierId.description:
The Carrier ID associated with this credential set.
Usually the short name of a carrier (e.g., "FedEx").

code.description:
A unique code identifying this credential set.
The code is only guaranteed to be unique at the tenant and carrier level.

name.description: A name (i.e., nickname) for this credential set.

values.description: A collection of values contained in this credential set.

integrationId.description: Specifies the ID returned from an integration.

CarrierCredentialSet.description:
Stores a set of <see cref="T:Mozu.ShippingAdmin.Contracts.Carriers.CarrierCredentialSetValue">carrier credential key-value pairs</see>.
Sets are stored at the tenant level and referenced by a Mozu.ShippingAdmin.Contracts.Carriers.CarrierCredential.

carrierId.description:
The Carrier ID associated with this carrier credential.
Usually the short name of a carrier (e.g., "FedEx").

siteId.description: The Site ID associated with this carrier credential, if any.

locationGroupCode.description: The Location Group Code associated with this carrier credential, if any.

locationCode.description: The Location Code associated with this carrier credential, if any.

CarrierCredential.description:
Stores a reference to a Mozu.ShippingAdmin.Contracts.Carriers.CarrierCredentialSet for use at different levels.
Valid levels include Site, Location Group, and Location. Different levels may be used for rates versus labels.
Site level is overriden by Location Group level which is overriden by Location level.

CarrierCredentialSetMetadataDataType.description: The type of field stored in a Mozu.ShippingAdmin.Contracts.Carriers.CarrierCredentialSetMetadata item.

CarrierCredentialSetMetadataLocalizedCon.description: The localized content for a Mozu.ShippingAdmin.Contracts.Carriers.CarrierCredentialSetMetadata item.

CarrierCredentialSetMetadata.description:
The metadata for a single field on a Mozu.ShippingAdmin.Contracts.Carriers.CarrierCredentialSet.
This metadata is used during carrier installation and carrier credential set validation.

CarrierDefinition.description:
A carrier definition including config field metadata.
Can either be a built-in system carrier or an Extensible Carrier installed via a <see cref="T:Mozu.ShippingAdmin.Contracts.Carriers.CarrierInstallation">carrier installation</see>.

id.description: The system generated id for this rule

sequence.description: The sequence in which this rule is preferred over others

shippingTargetRuleCodes.description:
The shipping target rule codes associated with this rule
<remarks>leave empty or null to denote all destinations</remarks>

productTargetRuleCodes.description:
the product target rule codes associated with this rule
<remarks>leave empty or null to denote all products</remarks>

serviceTypes.description:
the servicetypes associated with this rule
<remarks>leave empty or null to denote all carriers and subsequent service types</remarks>

valueType.description:
The type of this handling fee
<value>percentage</value><value>flatrate</value>

appliesTo.description:
The level at which this fee applies
<value>shippingrate</value><value>order</value>

HandlingFeeRule.description: An object to group a handling fee with zones, rules, and servicetypes

id.description: The system generated id of this shipping inclusion rule

sequence.description: The sequence in which this rule is preferred over others

shippingTargetRuleCodes.description:
The shipping target rule codes associated with this rule
<remarks>leave empty or null to denote all destinations</remarks>

productTargetRuleCodes.description:
the product target rule codes associated with this rule
<remarks>leave empty or null to denote all products</remarks>

serviceTypes.description:
the servicetypes associated with this rule
<remarks>leave empty or null to denote all carriers and subsequent service types</remarks>

ShippingInclusionRule.description: An object to bind service types to shipping target rules and/or product target rules

code.description: Merchant entered unique identifier for a ShippingProfile

targetedSiteIds.description:
The siteid's for which this profile applies
<remarks>for now there is a 1-1 relationship between this profile and site so only 1 siteid should be in this list</remarks>

code.description:
The user defined code for this rule
<remarks>must be unique</remarks>

TargetRule.description: An object used to define a bool expression against a particular domain type

bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme.
